ValidationRule.description: Prevent Population of CCI level when Service Type not Surgical Day Care
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Service_Type__c , "Surgical Day Care (Daily)") , NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL( CCI_Level__c, "High"), ISPICKVAL( CCI_Level__c, "Medium"), ISPICKVAL( CCI_Level__c,"Low"))), OR( ISPICKVAL( CCI_Level__c, "High"), ISPICKVAL( CCI_Level__c, "Medium"), ISPICKVAL( CCI_Level__c,"Low")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Select CCI Level when Service Type is Surgical Day Care. Otherwise, keep it empty.
